ValidationRule.description: A user needs to own the Case record before moving through the Case stages
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.Org_Wide_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c), ISCHANGED(Status), LEFT(OwnerId, 3) = '00G', OR( NOT( OR( TEXT(Status) = 'Initial Review', TEXT(Status) = 'CAF Form Completion', TEXT(Status) = 'Compliance Check', TEXT(Status) = 'Client Review and Doc Gen' ) ), AND( TEXT(Status) = 'Closed', NOT( OR( TEXT( Closed_Reason__c ) = 'Onboarded', TEXT(Closed_Reason__c ) = 'Yearly Check Complete', TEXT(Closed_Reason__c ) = 'Adhoc Check Complete', TEXT(Closed_Reason__c ) = 'Service Line Complete' ) ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure the Case is owed by a user before moving stages
